meanings.definition: A binary compound of hydrogen with another element.
meanings.sent1: Some metals can form hydrides when combined with hydrogen.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the properties of various hydrides in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The hydrides in the chemistry experiment were so reactive, they almost jumped out of the test tube!
meanings.sent4: The hydrides in the compound were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The smell of hydrides filled the room, reminding everyone of the power of chemistry.

meanings.definition: A compound formed by the union of hydrogen with another element.
meanings.sent1: Hydrides play a crucial role in many chemical reactions.
meanings.sent2: The scientist explained how hydrides are essential for certain industrial processes.
meanings.sent3: The hydrides in the mixture were like tiny puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: The bond between hydrogen and the other element in the hydrides was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The formation of hydrides was a magical process, combining two elements into one powerful compound.
